Cyberpunk Mercenary.subject: A female mercenary with cybernetic enhancements
Cyberpunk Mercenary.style: Cyberpunk, gritty, neon-noir, detailed concept art
Cyberpunk Mercenary.composition: Medium shot, dynamic pose, looking towards the viewer
Cyberpunk Mercenary.lighting: Dramatic neon lighting, harsh shadows, volumetric light from rainy streets
Cyberpunk Mercenary.details: Rain-slicked chrome, glowing holographic ads in the background, worn leather jacket

Enchanted Forest.subject: A majestic glowing stag
Enchanted Forest.style: Fantasy, ethereal, painterly style similar to Studio Ghibli
Enchanted Forest.composition: Centered subject, surrounded by ancient, moss-covered trees
Enchanted Forest.lighting: Soft, magical moonlight filtering through the canopy, bioluminescent mushrooms providing accent light
Enchanted Forest.details: Floating dust motes, intricate patterns on the stag's antlers, sparkling magical energy

Vintage Sci-Fi Poster.subject: A retro-futuristic rocket ship taking off from a barren alien planet
Vintage Sci-Fi Poster.style: 1950s science fiction book cover art, vintage poster design, pulp art
Vintage Sci-Fi Poster.composition: Low angle shot, emphasizing the scale of the rocket, two suns in the sky
Vintage Sci-Fi Poster.lighting: Bright, high-contrast sunlight from two sources
Vintage Sci-Fi Poster.details: Simple geometric shapes, bold colors, halftone dot patterns, weathered paper texture
